item.title: Easy way Install Docker
item.description: The easy way to install Docker-CE [brooqs@cybertron ~]$ curl https://get.docker.com | sh Note: This method supports only distros like Debian,Ubuntu,Fedora,Centos,oraclelinux
item.content:
The easy way to install Docker-CE


[brooqs@cybertron ~]$ curl https://get.docker.com | sh

Note: This method supports only distros like Debian,Ubuntu,Fedora,Centos,oraclelinux

item.title: Linux Permission Numbers
item.description: 0 = Empty 1 = –x -> Execute 2 = -w- -> Write 3 = -wx -> Write & Execute 4 = r– -> Read 5 = r-x -> Read & Excute 6 = rw- -> Read & Write 7 = rwx -> Read,Write,
item.content:
• 0 = Empty
  • 1 = –x -> Execute
  • 2 = -w- -> Write
  • 3 = -wx -> Write & Execute
  • 4 = r– -> Read
  • 5 = r-x -> Read & Excute
  • 6 = rw- -> Read & Write
  • 7 = rwx -> Read,Write,
